metadata.dc:title: Social Impact COVID-19 Events
metadata.dc:creator: Centers for Disease Control
metadata.dc:subject: coronavirus, covid-19, public health, health care, health care services, school districts, community businesses, communities, economic crises, pandemic, united states, state, municipality
metadata.dc:description: Dataset containing lists of and links to articles and announcements about the social impact of COVID-19. Topics include business closure, business reopening, school closure, elder care, healthcare worker, healthcare facility, lockdown/shelter in place, COVID-19 case clusters, mass testing, state of emergency declaration.
